mapper.select: SELECT prodreply_table.* FROM( SELECT rownum rn, p3.rev_no, p3.star_point, p3.rev_title, p3.rev_create, p3.rev_content, p3.user_id, p3.pay_no FROM PRODUCTS p JOIN PAYMENTS p2 ON p.prod_no = p2.prod_no JOIN PRODREPLY p3 ON p2.pay_no = p3.pay_no WHERE p.prod_no = #{prodNo}) prodreply_table WHERE prodreply_table.rn >=(#{page}-1)*5+1 AND prodreply_table.rn <= #{page}*5
SELECT COUNT(1) cnt FROM PRODUCTS p JOIN PAYMENTS p2 ON p.prod_no = p2.prod_no JOIN PRODREPLY p3 ON p2.pay_no = p3.pay_no WHERE p2.prod_no = #{prodNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO prodReply(rev_no, star_point, rev_title, rev_create, rev_content, user_id, pay_no) VALUES( (SELECT NVL(MAX(rev_no),0) + 1 FROM prodreply), #{starPoint}, #{revTitle}, sysdate, #{revContent}, #{userId}, (SELECT MAX(pay_no) FROM payments WHERE user_id =#{userId} AND prod_no=#{prodNo}))
INSERT INTO carts(cart_no, user_id, prod_no) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(cart_no),0) + 1 FROM carts), #{userId}, #{prodNo})
